file.name: site_internal_api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"

info:
    version: 0.1.0
    title: Mahiru Site internal API

paths:
  /assets:
    post:
      summary: Store an asset (metadata) in the site.
      operationId: storeAsset
      requestBody:
        description: The asset to store.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Asset"
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Successfully stored the asset
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: A message signalling success
                type: string
        "400":
          description: The request was not formatted correctly
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        default:
          description: A technical problem was encountered
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string

  /assets/{assetId}/image:
    put:
      summary: Store an asset image in the site.
      operationId: storeAssetImage
      requestBody:
        description: The asset image to store
        content:
          application/octet-stream:
            schema:
              type: string
              format: binary
        "201":
          description: Successfully stored the asset image
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: A message signalling success
                type: string
        "400":
          description: The request was not formatted correctly
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        "404":
          description: The asset with assetId was not found
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        default:
          description: A technical problem was encountered
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string

  /rules:
    post:
      summary: Store a new rule at the site
      operationId: storeRule
      requestBody:
        description: The rule to store.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Rule"
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          description: Successfully stored the rule
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: A message signalling success
                type: string
        "400":
          description: The request was not formatted correctly
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        default:
          description: A technical problem was encountered
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string

  /jobs:
    post:
      summary: Submit a new job to be run on the DDM
      operationId: submitJob
      requestBody:
        description: The execution request to submit
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ExecutionRequest"
        required: true
      responses:
        "303":
          description: Success, see the resulting job
          headers:
            Location:
              description: URL at which to retrieve the job's status
        "400":
          description: The request was not formatted correctly
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        default:
          description: A technical problem was encountered
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string

  /jobs/{jobId}:
    get:
      summary: Retrieve the result of a job, with outputs if available
      operationId: getJob
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The job's (partial) result
          context:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/JobResult"
        "404":
          description: The job with the given id was not found
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                description: An error message
                type: string
        default:
          description: A technical problem was encountered
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string

$ref: "./schemas.yaml/"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/assets": post: operation "storeAsset": requestBody: parse content: application/json: schema: parse schema: at 1:225: find schema: resolve: can't find value for "components/schemas/Asset"
